thread.title: Alphabet Microsoft Amazon give Wall Street reason to cheer
thread.title_full: Alphabet Microsoft Amazon give Wall Street reason to cheer

title: Alphabet Microsoft Amazon give Wall Street reason to cheer
text:
Alphabet, Microsoft, Amazon give Wall Street reason to cheer 
Reuters Business News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
For Alphabet, search traffic on mobiles surpassed desktop traffic worldwide for the first time, while Amazon was able to boost margins, an area of concern, as its cloud business boomed....
